body_html: I have encountered this issue as well. It looks like on Windows, the cupti DLL is not on PATH by default, so you will have to add its location manually. Potentially, this can be added to TF installation instructions for Windows.
body_text: I have encountered this issue as well. It looks like on Windows, the cupti DLL is not on PATH by default, so you will have to add its location manually. Potentially, this can be added to TF installation instructions for Windows.
body: I have encountered this issue as well. It looks like on Windows, the cupti DLL is not on PATH by default, so you will have to add its location manually. Potentially, this can be added to TF installation instructions for Windows.
